bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM TO AUTOMATICALLY QUALIFY A PARTY TO PARTICIPATE WITHIN A NETWORK-BASED COMMERCE TRANSACTION

abstract.p: A system to facilitate computer-based commerce includes receiving information relating to an item to be transacted via a computer-based commerce system from a first party. Criterion information specifying at least one criterion to be satisfied by a second party in order for the second party to be qualified to transact for the item via the computer-based commerce system is received from the first party. An automatic determination is made as to whether the second party satisfies the at least one criterion and if so, then the second party is automatically qualified to transact for the item via the computer-based commerce system.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system automatically to qualifying a party to participate within a network-based commerce transaction

Method and system automatically to qualifying a party to participate within a network-based commerce transaction
Verfahren und System zur automatischen Qualifizierung einer Partei zur Teilnahme an einer netzwerkbasierten Handelstransaktion
Procédé et système de qualification automatique d'une partie participante dans une transaction commerciale sur réseau

abstract.p: A method and system to implement seller authorized bidding within a networked-based auction facility are disclosed. In particular, the method includes the step of receiving (1722) a request to transact for a particular item that is described by a sales listing from a first party that is not pre-approved to transact for the particular item that is described by the sales listing. The first party is disqualified and disabled (1736) from transacting for the particular item. The disqualifying and disabling being based on a requirement that the first party be pre-approved to transact for the particular item that is described by the sales listing and identifying the first party as not being pre-approved. The method further includes the step of communicating (1738, 1740) error information, over a network, to the first party. The error information indicates that transacting for the item is restricted to pre-approved parties. The steps of the method are done at least in part through the use of one or more processors.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system to implement seller authorized buying privileges within a network-based shopping facility

abstract.p: The present invention discloses a system and method for an Internet-based shopping facility. The shopping facility allows a seller to select shoppers that may bid on the seller's auction listing or offer to but the seller's fixed price listing. Only the shoppers that receive authorization from the seller may bid on or buy the item or service offered for sale by the seller.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Method and system to implement seller authorized buying privileges within a network-based shopping facility

abstract.p: A method that commences by receiving a bid for a particular sales listing from a first bidder that is not pre-approved to bid on the particular sales listing. The method continues by restricting the bid for the particular sales listing from the bidding process associated with the particular sales listing, the restricting based on the requirement of the first bidder to be pre-approved to bid on the particular sales listing.

abstract.p: A method that commences by receiving a bid for a particular sales listing from a first bidder that is not pre-approved to bid on the particular sales listing. The method continues by restricting the bid for the particular sales listing from the bidding process associated with the particular sales listing, the restricting based on the requirement of the first bidder to be pre-approved to bid on the particular sales listing.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM TO IMPLEMENT SELLER AUTHORIZED BUYING PRIVILEGES WITHIN A NETWORK-BASED SHOPPING FACILITY

abstract.p: A method that commences by receiving an item identifier, over a network, from a seller on a network-based commerce facility, the item identifier identifying a particular sales listing that describes an item that is listed for sale by the seller on the network-based commerce facility as requiring bidders to be pre-approved to bid on the item. The method continues by automatically recording the item identifier in a database.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM AUTOMATICALLY TO QUALIFYING A PARTY TO PARTICIPATE WITHIN A NETWORK-BASED COMMERCE TRANSACTION
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE QUALIFICATION AUTOMATIQUE D'UNE PARTIE A PARTICIPER A UNE TRANSACTION COMMERCIALE SUR RESEAU

abstract.p: A method to facilitate computer-based commerce includes receiving information relating to an item to be transacted via a computer-based commerce system from a first party. Criterion information specifying at least one criterion to be satisfied by a second party in order for the second party to be qualified to transact for the item via the computer-based commerce system is received from the first party. An automatic determination is made as to whether the second party satisfies the at least one criterion and if so, then the second party is automatically qualified to transact for the item via the computer based commerce system.

L'invention concerne un procédé, destiné à faciliter le commerce informatique, consistant à recevoir une information se rapportant à un article devant être l'objet d'une transaction commerciale de la part d'une première partie dans un système informatisé. On reçoit de cette première partie une information spécifiant au moins un critère qui doit être satisfait par une seconde partie de façon à qualifier la seconde partie à réaliser une transaction concernant l'article via un système commercial informatisé. On détermine de façon automatique si la seconde partie satisfait au moins à ce critère et si oui, alors la seconde partie est qualifiée automatiquement à réaliser une transaction sur l'article via le système commercial informatisé.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD AND SYSTEM AUTOMATICALLY TO QUALIFYING A PARTY TO PARTICIPATE WITHIN A NETWORK-BASED COMMERCE TRANSACTION
PROCEDE ET SYSTEME DE QUALIFICATION AUTOMATIQUE D'UNE PARTIE A PARTICIPER A UNE TRANSACTION COMMERCIALE SUR RESEAU
